name: Papaya Global
description: Founded in 2016 by Eynat Guez, Ruben Drong, and Ofer Herman, Papaya Global revolutionizes payroll by bridging finance, HR, and payroll. The company automates manual tasks in hiring, onboarding, and payroll management, leads in remote work and global Employer of Record (EoR) solutions, and is the first to develop a native payments platform for payroll's complexities. Papaya Global brings true technological advancements to the traditional payroll world, ensuring efficiency and innovation.
features: Payments designed for your global payroll.
Enterprise-grade workforce solutions for all employment models.
Workforce OS brings payments and workforce management together onto a single platform.
business_objectives: Reduce the Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees
Headline: The only payments and payroll platform designed for a global workforce
ShortDescription: Global payroll & payments on one platform

Highlights.name: Fastest Go-Live
Highlights.description: Go live in just a few weeks with hassle-free imlementation.

Highlights.name: Professional Expertise
Highlights.description: Our team of local and global specialists can advise on immigration, benefits, compliance, equity, and much more.

Highlights.name: Seamless Integrations
Highlights.description: Workforce OS integrates with leading tools like Workday, Netsuite, and more.

enhanced_description: Papaya Global, founded in 2016, offers a unified global payroll and payments platform that bridges finance, HR, and payroll. It automates manual tasks across hiring, onboarding, and payroll management, providing comprehensive enterprise-grade workforce solutions suitable for all employment models, including remote work and global Employer of Record (EoR) services. Papaya Global distinguishes itself as the first to develop a native payments platform specifically designed for the complexities of global payroll, bringing significant technological advancements to traditional payroll processes, ensuring efficiency and innovation. Its core offering, the Workforce OS, consolidates payments and workforce management onto a single platform. The solution facilitates a fast go-live, typically within a few weeks, with hassle-free implementation. Papaya Global also provides professional expertise through a team of local and global specialists who offer advice on immigration, benefits, compliance, and equity. Furthermore, the Workforce OS integrates seamlessly with leading enterprise tools such as Workday and Netsuite.

Consolidating finance, HR, and payroll operations onto a single platform
Workforce management across diverse employment models
Reducing the cost associated with hiring qualified employees
